subject: Science
subcategory: The Big Bang and the Universe
title: The Cosmic Calendar

hook.text: If you compressed the universe's 13.8 billion years into one calendar year, humans arrive at 11:59 PM on December 31.

buildup.text: The Big Bang is January 1st. The Milky Way forms around March 16th.

discovery.text: Earth forms September 2nd. The first life appears September 21st.

twist.text: Dinosaurs go extinct on December 30th. All of recorded human history is the last 14 seconds.

climax.text: Everything humans have ever done fits into the final blink of the cosmic calendar.

punchline.text: All of human civilization is 14 seconds. The universe has been running for a whole year.

quiz.question: On the cosmic calendar, when does all of human history occur?
options: The last week of the year
